Welcome to Shoem!

The app that allows you to store all of your shoes (at least until you close your app…).

By pressing on the Go to inventory! button on the main screen, you can easily access the list of the shoes you added.

From there, you can add a new shoe, by pressing on the + button, or view the details of one of the shoes you added.

You can also add a series of images to every new shoe, that you can then see in the details of that shoe.

Shoem! is an app developed for the android kotlin developer nanodegree.

The main purpose of this app is to practice the things learnt in the first part of the course, such as:
- ViewModels
- Navigation
- DataBinding
- Layouts
- … and more!


 In this part of the course, we still haven't approached persistence, and this is why closing the application completely will result in the loss of the entire inventory.
Fields Company, Name and Size are mandatory
Username and Password are both required
